episodes.title: Cecelia Peck & Inbal B Lessner - Producers & Editor - Escaping Twin Flames
episodes.description: In todays episode we talk to Cecelia Peck and Inbal B Lessner, the dynamic duo behind the hit Netflix documentary Escaping Twin Flames which follows the story's of several survivors of the cult that still operates today. They talk to us about what it's like to work on these heavy story's, best practices for unscripted storytelling, and their journeys into the film industry.
